metadata.title: CVE-2021-22257 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab affecting all versions starting from14.0 before 14.0.9, all versions starting from 14.1 before 14.1.4, allversions starting from 14.2 before 14.2.2. The route for /user.keys is notrestricted on instances with public visibility disabled. This allows userenumeration on such instances.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
